titleStmt.title: Reasons why all good Christians should observe the holy fast of Lent extracted out of my Lord of Ely's Paschal fast.
titleStmt.author: Gunning, Peter, 1614-1684.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Peter Gunning, Bishop of Ely between 1674 and 1684. Cf. Wing, DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
